DOC.brief_title: Indinavir Plus Efavirenz Plus Adefovir Dipivoxil HIV-Infected Patients Who Have Not Had Success With Nelfinavir
DOC.detailed_description: In open-label , nonrandomized study , 120 HIV-infected patient stratify two group : fail nelfinavir vs protease inhibitor-naive . All patient receive indinavir plus efavirenz plus adefovir dipivoxil plus L-carnitine , orally . Plasma vRNA measure every 4 week Week 16 , every 8 week remainder 48-week study .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : Serologically document HIV infection . Baseline CD4 count great equal 50 cell vRNA great equal 10,000 copies/ml . Parental consent patient 18 . NelfinavirFailure Group : Must protease inhibitor experience solely nelfinavir consider drugadherent . Must candidate change therapy virologic failure receive nelfinavir entry ( least 16 week nelfinavir plus NRTI therapy least 10fold decline vRNA due nelfinavir therapy subsequent increase toward patient 's baseline vRNA least 10fold ) . Control Group : Must receive combination currently license nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor least 16 week . Must naive efavirenz , adefovir dipivoxil , NRTI 's . Exclusion Criteria Prior Medication : Excluded : Control group : Prior efavirenz , adefovir dipivoxil , nonnucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor . Required : Nelfinavirfailure patient : At least 16 week nelfinavir . Control group : At least 16 week combination currently license nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor .
